sentences: What are your annual maintenance fees, and do they differ before and after FDA clearance?
Could the pricing increase based on the total lines of code?
Do you have any FDA De Novo success cases that involved Golang and Kubernetes?
Will we need to share our entire source code with you?
Does your assessment also include vulnerabilities in our Kubernetes configuration?
We currently use Semgrep for vulnerability scanning—would adopting your service require us to stop using Semgrep?
korean: 연간 유지보수 비용은 어떻게 되나요? FDA 승인전과 후과 다른가요?
코드 줄에 따라 비용이 추가 될 수 있나요?
FDA De Novo 사례중 Golang, Kubernetes 사례가 있나요?
semgrep를 통해 취약성을 검사 하고 있습니다. 만약 당신의 서비스를 이용하면 semgrep 사용을 중단해야하나요
